about_the_game:
We need you, Pilot!


Do you love Exoblast?
Here's one way to support the game: grab the "Vampire Skins" pack and allow the development team to continue developing the game!
Every support pack comes with exclusive skins and announcer!

Exoblast is 100% free!


We wanted to make a fun and eye-catching first game.
But above all, we wanted to bring together a large community of passionate players.
Exoblast needs players and for that what better than a free game?

You like the game and want to thank the development team, help us, keep Exoblast servers online?
Whatever your reason, you are there to support us and we thank you very much!



This pack will give you vampire skins, so you can drink the blood of your enemies.
Enjoy the demonic announcer and scare the hell out of your opponent!

We are counting on you, Pilot!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

name: Exoblast - Vampire Skins

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Support us and get an exclusive bloody skin and announcer pack to scare the hell out of your opponent! Your help will allow us to keep Exoblast alive and to continue its development!
